TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . She was represented before the ORG by PERSON , a lawyer practising in Kimovsk . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by PERSON , ORG at ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
On DATE the applicant lodged an action before ORG against a private insurance company for payment of an index - linked insurance sum and compensation for non - pecuniary damage .

Of the CARDINAL hearings listed DATE and DATE , CARDINAL hearings were adjourned because the applicant did not attend , QUANTITY hearings were postponed because both parties defaulted , and QUANTITY hearings were adjourned because the defendant failed to appear .
From DATE to CARDINAL DATE the proceedings were adjourned because the judge was involved in other proceedings .
On DATE ORG asked the applicant to clarify her claims .
On DATE the applicant submitted the amended claims .
On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant ’s action .
On DATE ORG upheld the judgment on appeal .
